{{Description|This was originally a technique used in weeding and in ritual prayers for the yearly harvest, but Shinobu has not forgotten it, though her life as a shrine maiden may have ended.}}
'''Gyoei Narukami Kariyama Rite''' is [[Kuki Shinobu]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{Talent Note|snapshot|This ability's DMG|character=Kuki Shinobu}}
* Kuki Shinobu's Elemental Burst will deal:
** 7 instances of damage if she has more than 50% Max HP.
** 12 Instances of damage if she has 50% or less Max HP.

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|character=Kuki Shinobu|talent=Gyoei Narukami Kariyama Rite|constellation|1|To Cloister Compassion}}
* {{Talent Note|character=Kuki Shinobu|talent=Gyoei Narukami Kariyama Rite|constellation|5|To Cease Courtesies}}
